description.en: Śoṇagiri, son of Prabhākaraśarma, who lived on the banks of river Pinākinī, became Jagadguru Prajñāghana and attained blissful state on the night of the eighty day of the bright fortnight of the month of Vaiśāka in the year Subhānu/Svabhānu.

shlokas:
prabhAkarasyAtmabhavaH pinAkinItaTIbhavaH zONagirirjagadguruH.
svabhAnuvaizAkhasitASTamInizi prajJAghanaH prApa paraM padaM mudA..55..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
